name: Slime Rush: candy world
description:
Run, Dash, Eat and RUSH!

Grab your slime and jump into a run for glory and...fruits. In this runner game your goal is to eat as many as you can before the enemies get you. 

Venture forth different worlds, beat complex levels, meet new enemies, unlock new friends and show the world who is the best slime tamer!

* Expanding game: 2 worlds with more to come

* More than 10 levels for each world

* New world, new enemies 

* Unlock new slimes 

* Build your own level and share with your friends
